mapper.select: select ID, NAME, GEOM, SDO_GEOM.SDO_AREA(m.geom, 0.005) as "area", SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(m.geom, d.diminfo) as "center" from FLICKR_EUROPE_AREA_${radius} m, user_sdo_geom_metadata d where d.table_name = 'FLICKR_EUROPE_AREA_${radius}'

select ID, NAME, GEOM, SDO_GEOM.SDO_AREA(m.geom, 0.005) as "area", SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(m.geom, d.diminfo) as "center" from FLICKR_EUROPE_AREA_${radius} m, user_sdo_geom_metadata d where d.table_name = 'FLICKR_EUROPE_AREA_${radius}' and m.ID = #{areaid}

select ID, NAME, GEOM, SDO_GEOM.SDO_AREA(m.geom, 0.005) as "area", SDO_GEOM.SDO_CENTROID(m.geom, d.diminfo) as "center" from FLICKR_EUROPE_AREA_${radius} m, user_sdo_geom_metadata d where d.table_name = 'FLICKR_EUROPE_AREA_${radius}' and sdo_relate(m.geom, #{queryGeom},'mask=anyinteract') = 'TRUE'
